entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in R2R compilation time #100995
  • AddIniFile Not found! #100992
  • Arm64/Sve: The scaling of immediate in ldr and other instructions should take into account variable VL #100991
  • SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo throws an exception if compared to null #100990
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.FactorySha1Tests.HashAlgorithm_TransformBlockAndDispose_ConcurrentUseDoesNotCrashProcess fails #100983
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests.BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs #100979
  • [wasm] 'emcmake' is not recognized as an internal or external command, #100973
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ConnectionAttemptCanceled_AuthorityNotBlocked #100971
  • CompileToAssembly_SimpleUseInDebug test failure on windows amd64 #100964
  • [API Proposal]: Add ISOCurrencySymbol to NumberFormat and use it when parsing numbers #100959
  • [browser][hybrid][firefox] RangeError: invalid value "Cyrl" for option region #100955
  • [Mono] Deadlock during the GC stop-the-world phase when dotnet is embedded into a native application. #100953
    9.0.0
  • System.TypeLoadException from static field #100950
  • Issue with Options having an array property that is added twice #100948
  • runtime-libraries stress-* build definitions are failing in release/6.0 #100944
    9.0.0
  • `!pe` in windbg does not print first chance exception details #100943

Closed

  • JIT assert "(structBaseType != TYP_STRUCT) && (genTypeSize(structBaseType) >= originalSize)" failing in superpmi-collect #90944
    9.0.0
  • Follow up issue. We should probably never see a BBJ_ALWAYS block ending with a throw. #100458
    9.0.0
  • iOS: Breakpoint not hit in classes containing static fields that are initialized inline #100243
    9.0.0
  • Custom JsonSerializer with System.Text cannot handle non-finite floating point literals. #100952
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests.BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs(limit: 14398736) [FAIL] #100977
  • Timeout of ConnectionAttemptCanceled_AuthorityNotBlocked #100972
  • High memory consumption using X509Certificate2 GetNameInfo((X509NameType.UpnName, false) #99933
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Dependency analysis support for generic method reflection #81204
    9.0.0
  • [9.0-preview.1] Test process crash on Windows in Release mode with task throwing an exception #99187
  • Event log shows 5011 for sharepoint IIS log after the CU #99581
  • Toolchain setup on contributing workflow could be updated for Linux #69058
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix erroneous readonly on a mutable struct #100996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assert when using HashProviderCng concurrently #100989
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove regex tests blocking on async calls #100982
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][android] Run Linux Bionic runtime tests instead of libraries #100980
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100978
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Pass existing credscan suppression file to SDL scan #100976
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fixed printing jump destinations in disassembler on release #100967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Run MsQuic tests in parallel. #100947
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update SDK to preview 3 release #100945
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update Mariner 2.0 to Azure Linux 3.0 #100942
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove Win7 Helix queues #100981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Force TLS1.2 in update-machine-certs.ps1 #100987
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve performance on virtual method processing #100897
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow helper calls that always throw to be marked as no-return #100900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use wix 3.14.1-8722.20240403.1 #100889
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Add SVE feature detection for Windows #100937
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Merge internal policy baseline commit to public #100974
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100795
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.30
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100793
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.5
  • Update pull request/issue management bot configuration #100965
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Disable HTTP/3 LargeSingleHeader_ThrowsException Test Again #100956
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't emit analyzer warnings for MakeGeneric understood by ILC #100858
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WIP] Update entry assembly #100935
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: verify full profile consistency after importation #100869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip cleanup of eventpipe for mono to prevent crashes on shutdown #100938
    area-Tracing-mono, 9.0.0
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads #100898
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding missed synchronization #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add apt -y autoremove to our setup steps to keep machines clean. #100936
    area-Infrastructure
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Add new line to be specified for JSON formatting #100890
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [mini] Use atomics, instead of loader lock, for JIT wrappers #100925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow debuggers to see first chance exceptions #100854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
